name: The cobalt-blue gauntlets of Morin
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
These gauntlets are a relic of the dwarven hero Morin.
The wearer of these gauntlets can chant the command word 'urthalin'
Chanting the command word is known to interrupt spells and skills
as well as all bard songs in the area of the wearer.
